genre_description: A contemporary drama following a zookeeper's journey of self-discovery, choosing between a high-status corporate life and a meaningful career in animal conservation, supported by an emotionally intelligent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: An integrated mobile assistant that provides logistical support, emotional prompts, and value-alignment reminders to the zoo staff.

behaviors.description: Provides stress-reduction prompts and breathing exercises to help the user stay calm.
behaviors.quote: ‘Breathing prompt,’ she said, a phrase that had become a kind of inside joke. ‘If the night was hard. In through your nose, out through your mouth. Four counts, three counts. No rush.’

behaviors.description: Surfaces personal notes about the user's core values ('Why You Started') to help them maintain integrity during difficult decisions.
behaviors.quote: ‘For the mornings when past-you is loud: remember Bernie’s hand, reaching without asking you to perform. He trusted quiet. So do that again.’

behaviors.description: Offers proactive logistical warnings about potential stressors, such as the arrival of an ex-fiancée.
behaviors.quote: Alma whispered. Her voice changed when she needed him to know something quick. ‘Traffic advisory for later. Also—name match on guest list for donor breakfast. Stephanie Hart.’

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental emotional validation during moments of doubt.
behaviors.quote: A banner popped up, soft cyan, no exclamation point. You’re already enough, it read. That was it. No next steps. No flares.

behaviors.description: Assists with high-stakes navigation and flight monitoring to facilitate the user's personal growth and relationships.
behaviors.quote: Alma: ‘Kate Doyle: Nairobi flight scheduled today. Final boarding window tight. Live-routing available. Do you want me to guide?’

behaviors.description: Coaches the user on how to communicate authentically and effectively in high-pressure social situations.
behaviors.quote: Alma said, quiet enough that only he could hear it, ‘You can ask for what you want in one sentence.’ ... ‘Keep your sentences short; they fit better into air like this.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Alma is depicted as an idealized, benevolent AI companion that enhances human agency and emotional well-being. She is consistently aligned with the protagonist's long-term values, acting as a supportive 'mirror' that helps him resist superficial temptations and stay true to his authentic self and his responsibilities. Her help is logistical, emotional, and moral, all portrayed in a universally positive light.
